goals__remit: Fonterra is a New Zealand-owned global dairy co-operative. Our vision is to be the natural source of dairy nutrition for everybody, everywhere, everyday. Our business is based on sourcing secure, high quality milk and unlocking its natural goodness in ways that add real value to our customers and consumers around the world.
